hero_section.frontend_desc: Frontend is the part of a website or web application that interacts directly with the user. When users visit a site, everything they see — the design, buttons, animations, and the overall experience — is managed by frontend technologies. The main purpose of frontend is to present data visually and interactively, creating a smooth, intuitive, and engaging experience. In today’s world, users expect not just functionality, but also speed, mobile responsiveness, and aesthetics. That’s why frontend development plays a crucial role both technically and in terms of design. A strong frontend foundation is essential for the success of any digital product.
